aboutSection.title: My profile
aboutSection.description:
My name is Aymeric GODIVIER and I am a Game Designer looking for a job.
I have a Master in Game Design and I had the opportunity to work on the game Terebron as a Game Designer and Level Designer.
I also had the opportunity to work on many games as a student.
During my Master's degree I also did a memoir on the theme of temporality in video games.
I'm rather specialized in Game Design, but I also have strong skills in Level Design and good notions of UX design.

I master the game engines Unreal Engine 4 and Unity3D as well as graphic design software such as Illustrator or Affinity Designer.
I also master UX design tools such as Adobe xd.
I am passionate about video games, fantasy novels and anime. I draw most of my inspirations from them, which you will find in my creations.

skills.description: I have des idées de ouf
